title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to improve the program related to home and community based care.
content: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act with respect to the home- and community-based care program to: (1) revise income and disability eligibility requirements. (2) limit the number of States which may participate in such program. (3) permit States to limit the number of individuals who may receive program services. And (4) revise application of Medicaid spousal impoverishment rules to spouses of individuals receiving program services.
